<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="#a23915729757db0a6e9b79ff7cae9ecf6"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemzelimcompare-cpp-/systemzelimcompare/#a20d91d50ee3ed73e47f73e4ea32e84ed">SystemZElimCompare</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SystemZ Comparison Elimination&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns true if MI is an instruction whose output equals the value in Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3"><span class="doxyHighlight">static </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> preservesValueOf(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LGR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LGFR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LTR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LTGR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case SystemZ::LTGFR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (MI.getOperand(1).getReg() == Reg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if any CC result of MI would (perhaps after conversion)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reflect the value of Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="#a1848f66c0fbc18bb70b33c1e10a9d124"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a1848f66c0fbc18bb70b33c1e10a9d124">resultTests</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands() &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).isReg() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).isDef() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a CC def to BRCT(G), since we may have to split them again if the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CC users in CCUsers are testing the result of a comparison of some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value X against zero and we know that any CC value produced by MI would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also reflect the value of X.  ConvOpc may be used to pass the transfomed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opcode MI will have if this succeeds.  Try to adjust CCUsers so that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// test the result of MI directly, returning true on success.  Leave</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// everything unchanged on failure.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CCUserMI : CCUsers) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to remove both MI and Compare by converting a branch to BRCT(G).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or a load-and-trap instruction.  We don&#39;t care in this case whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CC is modified between MI and Compare.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BranchOnCounts += 1;</span></CodeLine>
